UnitDefinition.Name: Burden of disease indicator uncertainty distribution types.
UnitDefinition.Description: Burden of disease indicator uncertainty distribution types.

Unit.Name: Normal
Unit.Description: Normal distribution parameterised by a mean and upper p95 percentile.

Unit.Name: LogNormal
Unit.Description: LogNormal distribution parameterised by a mean and upper p95 percentile.

Unit.Name: Triangular
Unit.Description: Triangular distribution specified by a mode and a lower and upper boundary.
